scripts.generate:key:dev:
aws ec2 create-key-pair --key-name app-mpdw-keypairs-dev --key-type rsa --key-format pem --profile mpdw-dev > app-mpdw-keypairs-dev-info.json 
 cat app-mpdw-keypairs-dev-info.json | jq -r .KeyMaterial > app-mpdw-keyparis-dev.pem
scripts.generate:key:sit:
aws ec2 create-key-pair --key-name app-mpdw-keypairs-sit --key-type rsa --key-format pem --profile mpdw-sit > app-mpdw-keypairs-sit-info.json 
 cat app-mpdw-keypairs-sit-info.json | jq -r .KeyMaterial > app-mpdw-keyparis-sit.pem
